page.title: 03Station Manager Interview
page.content: {Q.What is your job at Marston Green?} A.I look after the station, sell tickets and give passengers information {Q.Where does this line run to?} A.It runs from Birmingham to Euston Station in London. {Q.What power do the trains use?} A.They use electricity. {Q.Which is the busiest day of the {week?} A.Saturday is the busiest day. {Q.What are the busiest times?} A.Between 8 and 9 o'clock in the morning. {Q.Is the station busy on Sundays?} A.No.The station is closed on Sundays. {Q.How many passengers travel from {Marston Green each day? } A.That's difficult to say because some use Travel Cards which can't be counted.
